summary: Defines a polymorphic Marshmallow schema that automatically chooses the correct subâ€‘schema based on an object's type, embeds a type identifier when dumping data, and uses that identifier to reconstruct the appropriate object when loading.
business_intent: Enable flexible serialization and deserialization of heterogeneous data structures within the CCXT library, simplifying handling of multiple possible object types in API payloads or configuration data.
